lockdrop_claimed.description: Boolean value indicating if the lockdrop_rewards for the lockup positions have been claimed or not

lockup_positions.description: Contains lockup Ids of the User's lockup positions with different durations / deposit amounts

pending_xmars.description: Pending rewards to be claimed by the user

reward_index.description: Value used to calculate deposit_rewards (XMARS) accured by the user

total_ust_locked.description: Total UST amount deposited by the user across all his lockup positions

Decimal256.description: A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal256(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0 The greatest possible value that can be represented is 115792089237316195423570985008687907853269984665640564039457.584007913129639935 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
